fll.title: 2019 Minnesota FIRST LEGO League - City Shaper

goal.name: m01_robot_bridge
goal.title: M01 - Elevated places - Robot is Supported by the Bridge

goal.name: m01_flags
goal.title: M01 - Elevated places - Number of flags that are clearly raised any distance, only by the Robot

goal.name: m02_crane_lowered
goal.title: M02 - Crane - Lowered from the Guide Hole

goal.name: m02_independent_supported
goal.title: M02 - Independent and Supported by another Blue unit

goal.name: m02_blue_circle
goal.title: M02 - Completely in the Blue Circle

goal.name: m03_inspection_drone
goal.title: M03 - Inspection Drone - supported by Axel A

goal.name: m04_crater_crossing
goal.title: M04 - Design for Wildlife - Bat supported by Branch B

goal.name: m06_traffic_jam
goal.title: M06 - Traffic Jam - Lifted and Independent

goal.name: m12_circles_red
goal.title: M012 - Color matching units in Circle Red

goal.name: m12_circles_tan
goal.title: M012 - Color matching units in Circle Tan

goal.name: m12_circles_white
goal.title: M012 - Color matching units in Circle White

goal.name: m14_precision
goal.title: M14 - Precision - Number of Tokens on Field

restriction.message: Cannot score in the blue circle if not supported by another unit
Cannot score levels without units in circles

subjectiveCategory.name: project
subjectiveCategory.title: Innovation Project
subjectiveCategory.scoreSheetInstructions: For each skill area, clearly mark the box that best describes the team's accomplishments. Teams should demonstrate everything at the level; if they are missing part, mark the level below. If the team does not demonstrate an area, put an 'X' in the first box for Not Demonstrated (ND). Please provide as many written comments as you can to acknowledge each team's hard work and to help teams improve. Use the back for additional comments if needed.

goal.name: problem_identification
goal.title: Problem Identification*
goal.description: Clear definition of the problem being studied

range.shortDescription: unclear; few details
range.title: Beginning
range.description: Doesn't relate to FLL theme, no understanding of technical terms.

range.shortDescription: partially clear; details missing
range.title: Developing
range.description: Relates only poorly to the FLL theme, limited understanding of technical terms.

range.shortDescription: mostly clear; detailed
range.title: Accomplished
range.description: Relates fairly well to the FLL theme, understand of technical terms, but didn't explain them all clearly.

range.shortDescription: clear; very detailed
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Integrates well with the FLL theme, demonstrated and shared a full understanding of technical terms.

goal.name: sources_information
goal.title: Sources of Information
goal.description: Quality and variety of data / evidence and sources cited

range.shortDescription: minimal quality; variety limited
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: quality OR variety need improvement; did not include professional(s)
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: sufficient quality and variety; included professional(s)
range.title: Accomplished

range.shortDescription: extensive quality and variety; included multiple professionals
range.title: Exemplary

goal.name: problem_analysis
goal.title: Problem Analysis
goal.description: Depth to which the problem was studied and analyzed by the team, including extent of analysis of existing solutions

range.shortDescription: minimal study; no analysis
range.title: Beginning
range.description: No research on the impact of the problem, alternative theories or interpretations ignored.

range.shortDescription: minimal study; some analysis
range.title: Developing
range.description: Limited research on the impact of the problem, alternative theories obscured.

range.shortDescription: sufficient study and analysis
range.title: Accomplished
range.description: Impact of problem clearly researched, considered alternative theories and had clear arguments.

range.shortDescription: extensive study and analysis
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Impact of problem thoroughly examined and applied to solution. Persuasive argument against alternatives.

goal.name: team_solution
goal.title: Team Solution*
goal.description: Clear explanation of the proposed solution and description of how it solves the problem

range.shortDescription: difficult to understand
range.title: Beginning
range.description: No solution presented. Team lacks enthusiasm for solution.

range.shortDescription: some parts confusing
range.title: Developing
range.description: Team members showed some enthusiasm.

range.title: Accomplished
range.description: Understandable but may not address the problem. Team members were actively participating and showed excitement. Project is a group effort.

range.shortDescription: easy to understand by all
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Easy to understand by all and clearly addressed the problem. Team members were articulate and enthusiastic about their solution.

goal.name: innovation
goal.title: Innovation
goal.description: Degree to which the team's solution makes life better by improving existing options, developing a new application of existing ideas, or solving the problem in a completely new way.

range.shortDescription: existing solution / application
range.title: Beginning
range.description: Solution is not innovative or new.

range.shortDescription: solution / application contains some original element(s)
range.title: Developing
range.description: Solution is somewhat innovative or uses limited knowledge of science and or technology.

range.shortDescription: original solution / application; potential added value
range.title: Accomplished
range.description: Solution is innovative and applies some knowledge of science and / or technology.

range.shortDescription: original solution / application; demonstrated added value
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Solution is innovative and applies knowledge of science and / or technology.

goal.name: solution_development
goal.title: Solution Development
goal.description: Systematic process used to select, develop, evaluate, test, and improve the solution (Implementation could include cost, ease of manufacturing, etc.)

range.shortDescription: process AND explanation need improvement
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: process OR explanation need improvement
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: systematic process included evaluation
range.title: Accomplished

range.shortDescription: systematic process included evaluation; implementation considered
range.title: Exemplary

goal.name: sharing
goal.title: Sharing*
goal.description: Degree to which the team shared their Project before the tournament with others who might benefit from the team's efforts

range.shortDescription: shared with family / friends
range.title: Beginning
range.description: Did not consider how their problem might impact themselves and others.

range.shortDescription: shared outside family / friends (such as classmates)
range.title: Developing
range.description: Considered how this might impact themselves or family, but not others.

range.shortDescription: shared with one audience who may benefit OR one professional
range.title: Accomplished
range.description: Considered how this might impact themselves and family and took that into account.

range.shortDescription: shared with multiple audiences who may benefit OR multiple professionals
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Considered how this impacts others and implemented a plan to include those impacts.

goal.name: creativity
goal.title: Creativity
goal.description: Imagination used to develop and deliver the presentation

range.shortDescription: minimally engaging OR unimaginative
range.title: Beginning
range.description: Lacked excitement.

range.shortDescription: engaging OR imaginative
range.title: Developing
range.description: Information presented with limited creativity.

range.shortDescription: engaging AND imaginative
range.title: Accomplished
range.description: Creative elements used in the presentation.

range.shortDescription: very engaging AND exceptionally imaginative
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Unique elements of creativity included.

goal.name: presentation_effectiveness
goal.title: Presentation Effectiveness
goal.description: Message delivery and organization of the presentation

range.shortDescription: unclear OR disorganized
range.title: Beginning
range.description: No supporting material, unable to answer judge questions.

range.shortDescription: partially clear; minimal organization
range.title: Developing
range.description: Ineffective visual aids and support material, hesitant answers to judge questions.

range.shortDescription: mostly clear; mostly organized
range.title: Accomplished
range.description: Supporting aids / material complement presentation, adequate answers.

range.shortDescription: clear AND well organized
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Carefully chosen aids / material add to presentation, comprehensive answers.

subjectiveCategory.name: core_values
subjectiveCategory.title: Core Values
subjectiveCategory.scoreSheetInstructions: For each skill area, clearly mark the box that best describes the team's accomplishments. If the team does not demonstrate skill in a particular area, then put an 'X' in the first box for Not Demonstrated (ND). Please provide as many written comments as you can to acknowledge each team's hard work and to help teams improve. Use the back for additional comments if needed.

goal.name: discovery
goal.title: Discovery
goal.description: Team explored and improved skills or ideas within all three aspects (Robot, Innovation Project, Core Values) of FIRST LEGO League; used creativity and persistence to solve problems

range.shortDescription: minimal examples / all examples from 1 aspect
range.title: Beginning
range.description: Problems identified, but steps not taken to solve. Team doesn't mention new skills acquired.

range.shortDescription: some examples / examples from 2 aspects
range.title: Developing
range.description: Problems identified, but solution was inadequate. Limited attention to new skills.

range.shortDescription: multiple examples / examples from all 3 aspects
range.title: Accomplished
range.description: Problems identified and solutions found. Team implied new skills acquired.

range.shortDescription: multiple examples of exploring new skills and ideas; extensive examples of improving in all 3 aspects
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Problems identified, solutions found working together. Team demonstrated new skills.

goal.name: team_spirit
goal.title: Team Identity
goal.description: Fun expression of team identity; team expresses how they enjoy FIRST LEGO League

range.shortDescription: minimal identity; minimal enjoyment
range.title: Beginning
range.description: Limited eye contact, member disengaged.

range.shortDescription: some identity; enjoyment is unclear
range.title: Developing
range.description: 1 / 2 the team interested, other members not paying attention.

range.shortDescription: clear identity; team clearly expressed their enjoyment
range.title: Accomplished
range.description: Most of team appears excited, members enthusiastic, but talk over each other.

range.shortDescription: clear identity; team engage others in their enjoyment
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Concrete examples of enthusiasm, all equally invested and speak.

goal.name: integration
goal.title: Impact
goal.description: Team applied knowledge. skills and/or values learned in FIRST LEGO League to improve themselves and their world.

range.shortDescription: unclear impact of FIRST LEGO League
range.title: Beginning
range.description: Members compete with each other to talk. Members show no awareness of school / community issues No mention of future goals.

range.shortDescription: knowlege, values or skills impacted some team members
range.title: Developing
range.description: Team shows limited awareness of school / community issues. Members imply future aspirations.

range.shortDescription: knowlege, values or skills impacted all team members
range.title: Accomplished
range.description: Increased awareness of outside issue evident. Team is vague about how this translates to other aspects of life. Suggest how it may have helped.

range.shortDescription: knowlege, values or skills impacted all team members AND team used values or skills to help others
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Demonstrated increased awareness and clearly discuss how this translates to other areas of life.

goal.name: effectiveness
goal.title: Effectiveness
goal.description: Problem solving and decision making processes help team achieve their goals

range.shortDescription: team goals AND team processes unclear
range.title: Beginning
range.description: Team members not collaborating.

range.shortDescription: team goals OR team processes unclear
range.title: Developing
range.description: Team members helping each other if asked. Various solutions tested in series, not thought out.

range.shortDescription: clear team goals and processes
range.title: Accomplished
range.description: Members help each other without asking to advance progress. Team tested or thought about various solutions.

range.shortDescription: clear processes enable team to accomplish well defined goals
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Members can fill in for each other easily. Various solutions tested and best incorporated.

goal.name: efficiency
goal.title: Efficiency
goal.description: Resources used relative to what the team accomplishes (time management, distribution of roles and responsibilities); team is stronger than its individual members

range.shortDescription: limited time management / role definition
range.title: Beginning
range.description: Not clear who completed which tasks.

range.shortDescription: clear time management / role definition
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: good time management / role definition allows team to avoid wasting effort OR resources
range.title: Accomplished
range.description: Clearly defined roles.

range.shortDescription: excellent time management / role definition allows team to avoid wasting effort AND resources
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Clearly defined roles, understood by all.

goal.name: kids_work
goal.title: Kids Do the Work
goal.description: Appropriate balance between team responsibility and coach guidance

range.shortDescription: limited team responsibility AND excessive coach guidance
range.title: Beginning
range.description: Decision making unclear, no team cooperation.

range.shortDescription: limited team responsibility OR excessive coach guidance
range.title: Developing
range.description: Team able to describe some decision making.

range.shortDescription: good balance between team responsibility and coach guidance
range.title: Accomplished
range.description: Team cooperation, decisions made by team.

range.shortDescription: team independence with appropriate coach guidance
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Cooperation within team is dominant theme. Team owns solutions.

goal.name: inclusion
goal.title: Inclusion
goal.description: Consideration and appreciation for the contributions (ideas and skills) and differences of all team members

range.shortDescription: limited consideration / appreciation for contributions
range.title: Beginning
range.description: Only one team member spoke, worked at judging.

range.shortDescription: consideration / appreciation for contributions of most team members
range.title: Developing
range.description: Multiple members spoke, but one in full charge.

range.shortDescription: clear consideration / appreciation for contributions of all team members
range.title: Accomplished
range.description: Members helped others.

range.shortDescription: all team members' contributions actively welcomed and recognized
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: All involved fully.

goal.name: respect
goal.title: Respect
goal.description: Team members act and speak with deference so others feel valued - especially when solving problems or resolving conflicts

range.shortDescription: not evident with majority of team members
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: evident with majority of team members
range.title: Developing
range.description: Only when absolutely necessary

range.shortDescription: clearly evident with all team members
range.title: Accomplished

range.shortDescription: clearly evident with all team members AND team encourages respect in others
range.title: Exemplary

goal.name: coopertition
goal.title: Coopertition
goal.description: Learning is more important than winning; Team learns from, teaches, and cooperates with each other and competing teams. Team competes in the spiriit of friendly competition

range.shortDescription: unclear or lack of team members cooperating with each other
range.title: Beginning
range.description: Members don't help each other. Confrontation is evident.

range.shortDescription: team members cooperate with each other
range.title: Developing
range.description: Members rarely helped each other, coexistence is dominant theme.

range.shortDescription: team actively learns from and teaches teammates / celebrates other teams' successes
range.title: Accomplished
range.description: Members implied they helped other and worked together. Some collaboration is evident.

range.shortDescription: team actively helps, learns from, or collaborates with other teams AND celebrates other teams' successes
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Shows respect and mutual help during judging.

subjectiveCategory.name: robot_design
subjectiveCategory.title: Robot Design
subjectiveCategory.scoreSheetInstructions: For each Robot Design criteria, clearly mark the box that best describes the ability of the team to demonstrate or provide evidence (such as analysis or test data) that their robot and processes meet that level of achievement. If the team does NOT describe a particular criteria at all, then put an 'X' in the first box for Not Demonstrated (ND). Please provide as many written comments as you can to acknowledge each team's hard work and to help teams improve. Use the back for additional comments if needed.

goal.name: durability
goal.title: Durability
goal.description: Robot designed to maintain structural intergrity and have the ability to withstand rigors of competition.

range.shortDescription: quite fragile; breaks a lot
range.title: Beginning
range.description: Base weak, falls apart when handled or run. Difficult to assemble.

range.shortDescription: frequent or significant faults / repairs
range.title: Developing
range.description: Robot has some stability. Assembles with few errors.

range.shortDescription: rare faults / repairs
range.title: Accomplished
range.description: Robot stable, but not robust. Assembles with no errors.

range.shortDescription: sound construction; no repairs
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Robot stable and robust. Robot assembles easily.

goal.name: mechanical_efficiency
goal.title: Mechanical Efficiency
goal.description: Robot designed to be easy to repair, modify, and be handled by technicians

range.shortDescription: excessive time to repair / modify
range.title: Beginning
range.description: Robot lacks critical design components: works, stays together, efficient part use. Few components work together, belong together.

range.shortDescription: inefficient to repair / modify
range.title: Developing
range.description: Robot lacks some critical design components: works, stays together, efficient parts use. Some components work or belong together.

range.shortDescription: appropriate time to repair / modify
range.title: Accomplished
range.description: Robot lacks few critical design components: works, stays together, efficient parts use. Most components work and belong together.

range.shortDescription: streamlined time to repair / modify
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Robot is elegant, complete. All components work together and look like they belong together.

goal.name: mechanization
goal.title: Mechanization
goal.description: Robot mechanisms designed to move or act with appropriate speed, strength and accuracy for intended tasks (propulsion and execution)

range.shortDescription: imbalance of speed, strength and accuracy on most tasks
range.title: Beginning
range.description: Difficulty going same distance repeatedly, turns inaccurate or inconsistent. Too fast for accuracy, too slow to complete mission.

range.shortDescription: imbalance of speed, strength and accuracy on some tasks
range.title: Developing
range.description: Goes defined distances and turns sometimes. Somewhat too fast for accuracy, or too slow to complete mission.

range.shortDescription: appropriate balance of speed, strength and accuracy on most tasks
range.title: Accomplished
range.description: Goes defined distance and turns reasonable accurately and consistently. Good speed balance.

range.shortDescription: appropriate balance of speed, strength and accuracy on every task
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Goes defined distance and turns accurately, efficiently and consistently. Adjusts speed for optimum control.

goal.name: attachments
goal.title: Attachments
goal.description: Attachments, if used, are an integrated part of the design, they are used appropriately and achieve consistent results.

range.shortDescription: weak or poorly designed attachments
range.title: Beginning
range.description: Weak or poorly designed attachments, difficult to add / remove.

range.shortDescription: not modular or consistent attachments
range.title: Developing
range.description: Not modular or consistent attachments, attachments awkward to add / remove. Not repeatable.

range.shortDescription: attachments somewhat modular and work as expected
range.title: Accomplished
range.description: Attachments somewhat modular and work as expected. Easy to add / remove. Somewhat repeatable.

range.shortDescription: attachments modular and work as expected
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Attachments modular and work as expected, repeatedly. They look like they belong to the robot.

goal.name: sensors
goal.title: Sensors
goal.description: Sensors, if used, are an integrated part of the design, they are used appropriately and achieve consistent results.

range.shortDescription: sensors used incorrectly.
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: sensor use inconsistent.
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: sensors used appropriately.
range.title: Accomplished

range.shortDescription: sensor use precise and repeatable.
range.title: Exemplary

goal.name: kids_work
goal.title: Kids Did the Work
goal.description: Appropriate balance between team responsibility and coach guidance

range.shortDescription: limited team responsibility AND excessive coach guidance
range.title: Beginning
range.description: Little knowledge of why parts are as they are on robot. Little or no understanding of what pieces do what.

range.shortDescription: limited team responsibility OR excessive coach guidance
range.title: Developing
range.description: Minimal understanding of underlying design, technology, strategy and robot structure.

range.shortDescription: good balance between team responsibility and coach guidance
range.title: Accomplished
range.description: Moderate understanding of robot structure, underlying design, strategy and technology.

range.shortDescription: team independence with appropriate coach guidance
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Thorough understanding of robot structure, underlying design, strategy and technology.

goal.name: design_process
goal.title: Design Process
goal.description: Developed and explained improvement cycles where alternatives were considered and narrowed, selections tested, designs improved (applies to programming as well as mechanical design)

range.shortDescription: organization AND explanation need improvement
range.title: Beginning
range.description: Disorganized AND poorly explained improvement cycles. Uses standard design. No design process (concept build test refine).

range.shortDescription: organization OR explanation need improvement
range.title: Developing
range.description: Disorganized OR poorly explained improvement cycles. Some forethought in initial design. Refinement of robot not well communicated.

range.shortDescription: systematic and well-explained
range.title: Accomplished
range.description: Basic understanding of design process, evidence of concept planning, building, testing, refining.

range.shortDescription: systematic, well-explained and well-documented
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Good communication of complete design process.

goal.name: mission_strategy
goal.title: Mission Strategy
goal.description: Clearly defined and described the team's game strategy

range.shortDescription: no clear goals AND no clear strategy
range.title: Beginning
range.description: Strategy based only on ease of task - no combined missions or maximizing time / effort.

range.shortDescription: no clear goals OR no clear strategy
range.title: Developing
range.description: Strategy based on ease of tasks, few risks. Some consideration or time / efforts / points.

range.shortDescription: clear strategy to accomplish well defined goals
range.title: Accomplished
range.description: Effective strategic planning, combining of missions, routes, attachments.

range.shortDescription: clear strategy to accomplish most / all game missions
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Excellent / innovative strategy, combining missions, routes, points.

goal.name: innovation
goal.title: Innovation
goal.description: Team identifies their sources of inspiration and creates new, unique, or unexpected feature(s) (e.g. designs, programs, strategies or applications) that are beneficial in performing the specified tasks.

range.shortDescription: no original feature(s)
range.title: Beginning
range.description: Design, drive, structure are standard. Expected sensor use only.

range.shortDescription: original feature(s) with some added value or potential
range.title: Developing
range.description: Either design creative, unique use of drive train or structure, or unique mission strategy.

range.shortDescription: original feature(s) with the potential to add significant value
range.title: Accomplished
range.description: More than one unique design, drive train, structure, or mission strategy.

range.shortDescription: original feature(s) that add significant value
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Extremely unique / creative design, drive train, structure and / or mission strategy.

subjectiveCategory.name: robot_programming
subjectiveCategory.title: Programming
subjectiveCategory.scoreSheetInstructions: Directions: For each skill area, clearly mark the box that best describes the team's accomplishments. If the team does not demonstrate skill in a particular area, then put an 'X' in the first box for Not Demonstrated (ND). Please provide as many written comments as you can to acknowledge each teams's hard work and to help teams improve.

goal.name: code_structure
goal.title: Code Structure
goal.description: Programs show proper use of variables, loops, condition and parameters.

range.shortDescription: variables, loops and conditions / parameters defined, but not used
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: variables, loops, conditions / parameters exist, but not fully understood or utilized
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: variables, loops, conditions / parameters are used and understood.
range.title: Accomplished
range.description: Some signs of code reuse.

range.shortDescription: variables, loops, conditions / parameters are used effectively.
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Code reuse evident and understood.

goal.name: code_reuse
goal.title: Code Reuse
goal.description: Programs show proper use of MyBlocks, subroutines and/or comon methods and there is an understanding of code reuse.

range.shortDescription: MyBlocks, subroutines and / or common methods defined, but not used
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: MyBlocks, subroutines and / or common methods exist, but not fully used or utilized
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: MyBlocks, subroutines and / or common methods are used and understood. some signs of code reuse
range.title: Accomplished

range.shortDescription: MyBlocks, subroutines and / or common methods are used effectively. code reuse evident and understood
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Programs show proper use of code reuse, subroutines and/or comon methods and there is an understanding of code reuse.

goal.name: kids_work
goal.title: Kids Did the Work
goal.description: Appropriate balance between team responsibility and coach guidance

range.shortDescription: limited team responsibility AND excessive coach guidance
range.title: Beginning
range.description: Little knowledge of how programs work on robot. Little or no understanding of what pieces do what.

range.shortDescription: limited team responsibility OR excessive coach guidance
range.title: Developing
range.description: Appears primarily directed by the coach. Minimal understanding of underlying design, strategy and robot programming.

range.shortDescription: good balance between team responsibility and coach guidance
range.title: Accomplished
range.description: Moderate understanding of underlying design, strategy and robot programming. Kids describe most missions.

range.shortDescription: team independence with appropriate coach guidance
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Thorough understanding of underlying design, strategy and programming. Kids describe missions and reference appropriate programs.

goal.name: quality
goal.title: Programming Quality
goal.description: Programs are appropriate for the intended purpose and should achieve consistent results, assuming no mechanical faults

range.shortDescription: would not achieve purpose AND would be inconsistent
range.title: Beginning
range.description: Programs inefficient and / or unpredictable.

range.shortDescription: would not achieve purpose OR would be inconsistent
range.title: Developing
range.description: Programs results still somewhat unpredictable.

range.shortDescription: should achieve purpose repeatedly
range.title: Accomplished
range.description: Efficient and work as expected. Easy to modify / debug. Well commented.

range.shortDescription: should achieve purpose every time
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Programs logically organized, efficient and always work, even for complex tasks.

goal.name: efficiency
goal.title: Programming Efficiency
goal.description: Programs are modular, streamlined and understandable

range.shortDescription: excessive code and difficult to understand
range.title: Beginning
range.description: Programs disorganized. Only uses simple coding constructs, no knowledge of complex language constructs.

range.shortDescription: inefficient code and challenge to understand
range.title: Developing
range.description: Programs somewhat organized, efficient at a couple tasks. Some understanding of language constructs.

range.shortDescription: appropriate code and easy to understand
range.title: Accomplished
range.description: Organized, the team has a good understanding of language constructs.

range.shortDescription: streamlined code and easy for anyone to understand
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Logically organized, and the team has an excellent understanding and use of language constructs.

goal.name: automation
goal.title: Automation / Navigation
goal.description: Robot designed to move or act as intended using mechanical and / or sensor feedback (with minimal reliance on driver intervention and / or program timing.

range.shortDescription: frequent driver intervention to aim AND retrieve robot
range.title: Beginning
range.description: Sensors inappropriately used, and didn't provide any help.

range.shortDescription: frequent driver intervention to aim OR retrieve robot
range.title: Developing
range.description: Sensors occasionally used effectively. Provide some aid in navigation and manipulation.

range.shortDescription: robot moves / acts as intended repeatedly w/ occasional driver intervention
range.title: Accomplished
range.description: Sensors were effectively used, repeatable, provided definitely improvement.

range.shortDescription: robot moves / acts as intended every time with no driver intervention
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Sensors guarantee certain actions every time.

goal.name: design_process
goal.title: Design Process
goal.description: Developed and explained improvement cycles where alternatives were considered and narrowed, selections tested, design improved (applies to programming as well as mechanical design)

range.shortDescription: organization AND explanation need improvement
range.title: Beginning
range.description: Uses simple programming design. No design process (concept code test refine).

range.shortDescription: organization OR explanation need improvement
range.title: Developing
range.description: Some forethought in initial programming design. Refinement of code not well communicated.

range.shortDescription: systematic and well-explained
range.title: Accomplished
range.description: Basic understanding of design process, evidence of concept planning, coding, testing, refining.

range.shortDescription: systematic, well-explained and well-documented
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Good communication of complete design process.

goal.name: mission_strategy
goal.title: Mission Strategy
goal.description: Clearly defined and described the team's game strategy.

range.shortDescription: no clear goals AND no clear strategy
range.title: Beginning
range.description: Strategy based only on ease of task - no combined missions or maximizing time / effort.

range.shortDescription: no clear goals OR no clear strategy
range.title: Developing
range.description: Strategy based on ease of tasks, few risks. Some consideration for time / efforts / points.

range.shortDescription: clear strategy to accomplish well defined goals
range.title: Accomplished
range.description: Effective strategic planning, combining of missions, routes, attachments, code.

range.shortDescription: clear strategy to accomplish most / all game missions
range.title: Exemplary
range.description: Excellent / innovative strategy, combining missions, routes, points.

goal.name: innovation
goal.title: Innovation
goal.description: Team indentifies their sources of inspiration and creates new, unique or unexpected feature(s) (e.g. designs, programs, strategies or applications) that are beneficial in performing the specified tasks.

range.shortDescription: no original feature(s)
range.title: Beginning
range.description: Programs and strategy are standard. Expected sensor use only.

range.shortDescription: original feature(s) with some added value or potential
range.title: Developing
range.description: A unique use of programming or mission strategy.
